text: Is it possible to change the date format used for a date contact property in an email? I know that generally you can't use the normal HubL filters, but there's gotta be a way of displaying a date, right?
Ours display like YYYY-MM-DD but as you mentioned the HubL filters won't work... I haven't managed to find a way to format it another way so interested to know if anyone else has!
Huh, in the test I'm doing it displays like "10/6/20". Maybe that's dependent on a portal setting.
